string.value: Agent #b#p1103002##k of #m103000000# had something to tell me.

#p1103002# said there were so many dolls with him that he couldn't tell which one was which and wound up asking #b#p9000008##k to sort out the dolls for him. My job is to go up to him and ask for the real doll from the pile.\n\n#i4032138# #t4032138# #b#c4032138# / 1#k
I was able to score the real #t4032138# from #p9000008# and handed it to #p1103002#.

There were so many dolls to look into that there's no way I can tell which one is which. This is why quantity over quality isn't necessarily a good thing even in gathering up evidences. Anyway, I needed major help, so I wound up contacting #b#p9000008##k and asked for help in finding the real doll. So I want you to go get it for me.
I don't know about anything else, but #p9000008# definitely has an eye for things like this, so I'm sure we have the real doll plucked out from the mass. Just get it for me, will you?
Wait, you're not going to go? Are you ready to be ridiculed by #p1101002#, then?

Good thing you managed to retrieve #t4032138#. What? #p9000008# was complaining that he didn't get paid? Hmmm! Taking care of the mission is more important in the grand scheme of things, don't you agree? As long as we found the doll, we're good, right?
Hmmm, anyway, we did wind up finding the real #t4032138#.
Please go see #b#p9000008##k and retrieve the real #b#t4032138##k. He probably already had it separated from the rest.
